pr_title: azure-core 1.5 fixed this bug on odata.type

timeline.bodyText: Did you try to run living test for monitor locally after these changes?
timeline.author: xseeseesee
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,7 +15,7 @@
 @JsonTypeInfo(
     use = JsonTypeInfo.Id.NAME,
     include = JsonTypeInfo.As.PROPERTY,
-    property = "odata.type",
+    property = "odata\\.type",

replies.bodyText:
Already had a test for this.
https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/monitor/mgmt/src/test/java/com/azure/management/monitor/TypeSerializationTests.java#L19
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft
